type DataObjectSettingDataEventHandler = delegate of obj * DataObjectSettingDataEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 复制操作过程中尝试将数据格式添加到数据对象时发生该事件。The event occurs when an attempt is made to add a data format to the data object during a copy operation. 事件处理程序方法通常用于通过筛选应用于的不需要的或不需要的数据格式来应用复制命令优化 。A event handler method is typically used to apply copy command optimization by filtering unwanted or unneeded data formats from being applied to a .
